Say goodbye to the hassle of navigating through numerous documents in your Firebase console.

With FirebaseElevate, a browser extension designed to organize related collections, you can easily navigate all your documents with just a few clicks!

`🚀 Features
  ⭐️ Easily navigate your Firestore collections
  ⭐️ See related collections at a glance
  ⭐️ Quick access to frequently used collections and documents
  ⭐️ Access your Firestore Collection from Firebase Authentication`  

🚀🚀 Upcoming Features
  ⭐️ Share your FirebaseElevate across your team`

This project is proudly open-source. Take a dive at the repo here: 
https://github.com/edwardsmoses/firestore-extension
